subject: Pedals not connecting anymore
description_text:
Hello,

I did not use my pedals for a few months and then connected them today. 
They seemed to be working fine, but when trying to calibrate it timed 
out on sending out the calibration to the pedals. The inputs were all 
working fine. Since there were both updates for the pedals and the 
software I did both: the software update for the manager went find. The 
pedal update stood very long (5minutes?) on 100% and then said "upgrade 
completed".

I restarted my PC and from then on I was not able to connect the pedals 
anymore and they showed up with the error in the image in the device 
manager in Windows. The pedals are connected with the original USB cable 
to the PC and I tried different ports, but also another cable. The power 
to the pedals was disconnected after the restart of the PC when they did 
not show up as connected as one of the troubleshooting steps.

What can I do? I can't use the pedals like this.

Best regards,
Matthias

conversations.body_text: Hi Matthias Merlo,  Please provide your order number and pedal model. You can enter recovery mode to manually update the firmware for the corresponding pedals. Also, make sure to use a rear USB 3.0 (blue) port on your computer, and avoid using USB hubs without external power or USB 2.0 ports.

Hi,

the order number on Amazon was 306-9595094-8461903.

How can I enter recovery mode? During the firmware update it also showed 
that there is CPU1 and CPU2 with different versions? Can I switch to the 
other one to test?

Best regards,
Matthias
Hi Matthias Merlo,  May I ask whether your product is the PlusX pedal or the ProX Ultra pedal?

Hi,

it's the Plus X pedal.

Best regards,
Matthias

Hi Matthias Merlo,  Please follow the steps below:  Press and hold the upgrade button on the PlusX main controller, then reconnect the USB cable.  Open SIMSONN Manager 2.1.2 and check if it has entered recovery mode.  If recovery mode is detected, go to Settings → Update → Manual Update Firmware → pedals → firmware → pedals-plusx.sfu.  After the update is complete, test the device to see if it has been restored successfully.
